trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_000<tab>My word─is that you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? I am overjoyed that fate would arrange this meeting, though I am not surprised. When I heard tell of your journey with Wuk Lamat, I had a feeling it would only be a matter of time until we crossed paths.

TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab>What am I doing in Tural, you ask? Why, I am come in search of unusual and fantastic stories that I may weave into songs, to spin tales that will enchant crowds the world over.

TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>And this land has proven to be a treasure trove of folktales and legends unlike any that can be found across the sea. I have set each and every one to memory, and my head is swimming with new verses...

TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_003<tab>Yet for all the myths newly added to my repertoire, I still yearn for tales of newfound adventure. Tales involving parties that yet live─preferably recounted by someone with firsthand experience!

TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_004<tab>...And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are just such a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>! Pray share with me everything that happened since you set foot in Tural, and I shall set it to song.

TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_005<tab>Every trial you endured during the rite of succession, every blood-curdling moment of your assault upon the levin-shrouded dome─I beg you spare no detail.
TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_006<tab>Your words will lend texture to my melodies and substance to my lyrics! Oh, I have a feeling my most memorable work is soon to come!

TEXT_KINGYR102_05004_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_007<tab>Of course, I understand you may not have the time at present. I shall be here for a while yet, polishing my prose to a mirror sheen. Simply come to me when you have a story to share, and I shall listen in rapt attention.
